channel.title: The Crow Murderer(Neutral Killing)
channel.description:
Passives Crows Ritual-You will be night immune if your able to kill someone
Black magic-Your visits will not be seen by the observer and the knight can't protect anyone from YOU
Day abilities
Hallucination-You will think that everyone is a crow and ignore immunity Occupation Healing and Preventing tonight-Can only be used after 3 kills and has a 4 day cooldown
Night abilities
Crow's death-Grab someone and slit their throat with a knife any 2 players visiting will be silenced by the bloody scene and unable to talk tommorow.
Lore:The Crow Murderer just used to be a normal Physician and used to love everything BUT CROWS .One day his hate for crows made him insane that he started killing all the crows after learning that he had gained powers he first used it for good until the powers made him insane too and well he started thinking humans love crows and he hated them for that so he started killing them all.
Note:THIS IS MY FIRST EVER CLASS THERE MAY BE TYPOS MISTAKES AND ALL .

item.title: The Crow Murderer(Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
Kind of op
Occupying/night immunities are there.for a reason, and talking during the day are pretty essential to the game. Making a number of people unable to talk at all during the day could severly hinder everyone involved (even the ones who aren’t silenced), if not their chance for winning, then maybe how fun the game is (although that varies wildly from person to person).
In short, silencing one person can be okay, if some right, but possibly silencing a number of people is rarely good
But for a first shot, I think it’s pretty good, you do have the right idea!

Read full topic
